ygData.subject: Re: Marriage
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a shmoe.  My dad s birthday is today, and I totally forgot (I swear, I think I got thrown by that whole 7th/8th Saturday/Sunday thing too).  Dnaice, I
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a shmoe. My dad's birthday is today, and I totally forgot (I swear, I think I
got thrown by that whole 7th/8th Saturday/Sunday thing too). Dnaice, I wanted so
badly to be at your festivities, but there isn't a way possible. I hope you will
forgive me and appreciate the sentiment that I wanted to be there. I hope your big
day is as wondrous as a girl could wish for, and that you are surrounded by your
friends and chosen family, and feel truly loved, respected, and cherished. I wish
you the best of adventures and most glorious of hunts, and I hope Corellon
appreciates the treasure he is being gifted with--your love and companionship.

Sara, Povar
Ishtarre, Quellios
Valdaya, Rallos Zek

Judy Tyrer wrote:

> From: Judy Tyrer <judy3t@...>

> toilet thing>)
